txt.en: If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Thorin's Gate following the defeat of the Dourhands, speak with Nos Grimsong.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the introduction is complete.</rgb>

If you choose to skip the introductory tutorial experience, you will be transported to Thorin's Gate after the defeat of the Dourhands and will be unable to travel to Thorin's Gate prior to those events.\n\nAre you sure you want to continue?
Allows you to skip directly through all newbie experiences into the main portion of the game.
Talk to Nos Grimsong to skip the Introduction
If you would like to skip the remainder of the introductory tutorial experience and be transported to Thorin's Gate following the defeat of the Dourhands, speak with Nos Grimsong.
<rgb=#FF0000>This quest must be completed before the introduction is complete</rgb>
